item.title: Desk chair dumped in bushes, 21st February
item.description:
A desk chair has recently been left in the greenery at the corner of Bakery St and Arts Lane. There’s already several reports for the multiple mattresses right by this spot (Grange Yard), but it hasn’t been dealt with for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Grange Yard, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Slippery drain cover on pathway, 21st February
item.description:
At the entrance to crystal palace station road there is a drain cover on the walkway next a green box. I slipped on this while walking down the hill and cracked my right hip leg and knee joint. It was very slippery as it was raining.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Station Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular spot for ankle deep puddle., 21st February
item.description:
A large puddle almost covering the whole of bus stop road marking every time it rains and no action has been done to clear out drains ever.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Court Yard, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirt & Damage to vehicle when cutting grass., 21st February
item.description:
134 maylands drive, DA14 4rl.The contractor cut the grass outside my home and caused dirt, debris and damage to my vehicle that was parked outside my home.i took video footage and screen shots.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 136, Maylands Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
